news_header: Charities criticize Ofgem's plans to change standing charges, viewing them as complicated and unfair to consumers.
news_original_title: Backlash over energy standing charges shake-up
news_text: Charities and energy providers have criticized Ofgem's plans to change standing charges on bills, claiming they are complicated and do not address the high costs of energy. Many consumers find these fixed fees unfair, as they pay regardless of usage. Ofgem's proposal includes a no standing charge option but has faced backlash for potentially hiding costs within unit rates.
